display.title: Cover Behaviour
description: Covers are placed by right-clicking with Cover in hand on a face of a machine, and removed with a &&5Crowbar&&r (or by mining the machine, but that's way slower).
Pretty much any GregTech "machine" will accept Covers, even if they wouldn't provide any functionality.
Opening a Cover is done by sneak-right-clicking it with an &&5empty hand&&r. You can also right-click with a &&5Screwdriver&&r, or sneak-right-click on another face using the grid.
For Covers that transfer Items/Fluids, you will have a button to enable/disable other forms of transfer through the cover:
&&9- &&rDisabled: only the cover will be allowed to transfer on this machine side.
&&9-&&r Allow Filtered (only relevant with a filter!): other transfer will be enabled only if it matches the filter
&&9-&&r Allow Unfiltered: any other transfer is allowed on this machine side.
Placing a cover of a lower voltage tier on a machine is &&9safe&&r.

subtitle.text: Extra utility without taking up blockspace!
